Plot: A CIA operative hires a team of mercenaries to eliminate a Latin dictator and a renegade CIA agent.
Title: The Expendables
Writer: Dave Callaham (screenplay), Sylvester Stallone (screenplay), Dave Callaham (story)
Actors: Sylvester Stallone, Jason Statham, Jet Li, Dolph Lundgren
tomatoConsensus: It makes good on the old-school action it promises, but given all the talent on display, The Expendables should hit harder.
